item.title: About Othmane Rifki
item.description: I am a former particle physicist turned machine learning scientist. This is my journey! Email: othrif@gmail.com LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/othrif/ Twitter: @OthmaneRifki Selected Experience Principal Applied Scientist, Spectrum Labs, Oct 2020 - Present Postdoctoral Fellow, DESY, Oct 2017 - Sep 2020 Doctoral Researcher, CERN, Jul 2015 - Sep 2017 Research Fellow, ANL, May 2014 - Jun 2015 Research Assistant, OU, Aug 2012 - May 2014 Selected Works Website Notes, othrif.
